pr_title: (Plugin-388) Fail Parquet output format validation if schema definition is null or empty.

timeline.message: (PLUGIN-388) Fail parquet output format validation if schema is set as null.
(PLUGIN-388) Add detailed error messages for parquet output format validation errors.
Updated PR to fail parquet output schema validation for both null and empty schema definition

timeline.bodyText: Dont think there is need to add this dependency explicitly.
timeline.author: CuriousVini

replies.bodyText: I do see this dependency explicitly specified in other plugin packages like (database-plugins, http-plugins, core-plugins) so its best to follow the same pattern.
replies.author: supriyapatil-google

timeline.message: Updated PR to override ParquetOutFormatProvider#validate(FormatContext) and validate schema as part of the method and added unit tests in FileSinkTestRun to validate empty/null schema values.
